Kyle Schwarber matched Brady Anderson for ninth with 44 leadoff homers

Pre-Game Insights: We all know when Kyle gets hot, man, it's fun to watch,

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies selected the contract of RHP Nick Nelson from Triple-A Lehigh Valley and optioned RHP Tyler Phillips to Triple-A
